page.title: 15TRADE IN HOLBEACH DR CONT'D
page.content: THE VILLAGE NEARBY OF GEDNEY HILL HAS A STORE CALLED MARSHALLS AND THEY COVER THE AREA BY WAY OF A 'STORE ON WHEELS' GOING OUT DAILY TO THE AREA AND OTHER VILLAGES NEARBY TWICE WEEKLY. THEY HELP THOSE WHO FIND IT DIFFICULT TO GET THEIR GROCERIES ESPECIALLY THE ELDERLY. MOST OF THE ESSENTIAL FOODS ARE SOLD BY THIS MOBILE SHOP AND IN EMERGENCIES IF THE VAN IS ABOUT LIVING IN THE COUNTRY NEED NOT BE A PROBLEM. WITH LITTLE TRADE CLOSE AT HAND PEOPLE TEND TO SHOP WEEKLY OR MONTHLY OTHERWISE, IN SPALDING OR HOLBEACH OR EVEN PETERBOROUGH AT THE SUPERMARKETS LIKE KEYMARKET/TESCO/FINE FARE ETC. FOR OTHER SHOPPING IE. CLOTHING, OR FOR CHRISTMAS PRESENTS THEY GO TO THE NEW QUEENSGATE SHOPPING COMPLEX IN PETERBOROUGH AT THE MOST A 20MILE JOURNEY.
